metadata.title: CVE-2022-33981 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: drivers/block/floppy.c in the Linux kernel before 5.17.6 is vulnerable to adenial of service, because of a concurrency use-after-free flaw afterdeallocating raw_cmd in the raw_cmd_ioctl function.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
